item.title: Running the Mayflower Half Marathon
item.description: Running the Mayflower Half Marathon Training Miles by Week W0 W1 W2 W3 W4 W5 W6 W7 W8 W9 W10 W11 W12 W13 W14 W15 5 10 15 20 0 Day by day CSV data here. On October 2nd, 2022 I ran my first half marathon in 1 hour and 56 minutes.
